scene.name: Scene 1
scene.text: 'Tawfique the Turtle is sick,' mom says. 'Be a dear, Rayyan, and fetch some seaweed from the coast for me for his medicine. Oh, and don't go alone -- Croc might be around.' 'Okay mom!' Rayyan yells, as he darts out the den.

scene.name: Scene 2
scene.text: All your Deen Games are belong to us!
